title: STAT+: FDA puts off Stoke’s request for faster filing of severe epilepsy drug
description: Stoke Therapeutics and the FDA were unable to reach agreement on an expedited submission for the company’s severe epilepsy treatment, the company said Sunday.
content: Stoke Therapeutics and the FDA were unable to reach agreement on an expedited submission for the company’s severe epilepsy treatment, the company said Sunday.
